page.title: 03The Greenham Peace Camp
page.content: { On the news the women of Greenham {Peace Camp appear to be causing {trouble by breaking into the air base {at Greenham Common. They are also in {court quite often on various small {charges. The image created by the {media is sometimes even violent. { During our study of this area we {visited the camp to take some {photographs. We spoke to the women who {were present on that day, Monday 1st {July 1985, and they were very {different from what we had expected. {They were polite and friendly, they {chatted about the survey and joked {about the term 'Domesday'. { They explained that they were {simply demonstrating their point of {view about nuclear missiles, and were {often upset by their public image. { { }
